body.p: present: [3.] bíbharti bíbhrati etc. bibhárti etc. RV1.+ bibhṛṣva bibhrāṇa -- [1.] bíbhramāṇa -- bhárati bhárate etc. V.+ -- [2.] bharti
perfect: babhāra etc. B.+ babhrima babhre babhrāṇá jabhā́ra etc. jabhre etc. jabhartha jabhárat ajabhartana -- bibharām babhūva
aorist: [1.] bhartám bhṛtám abhṛta bhṛiyāsam bhṛiyāt abhāri -- [3.] ībharas -- [4.] abhārṣīt etc. abhār abhāriṣam bharṣat
future: [1.] bhariṣyáti etc. V.+ ábhariṣyat -- [2.] bhartā́
secondary: passive: bhriyate etc. V.+ bhriyati -- intensive: jarbhṛtás bháribhrati etc. barībharti -- desiderative: bubhūrṣati etc. B.+ bibhariṣa- -- causative: bhārayati

derivatives: -bhra? V.+ bhára V.+ -bhala? AV.S. bháraṇa V.+ bharaṇīya E.+ bharas V.B. -bhári RV.C. bharu C. bharatá V.+ bhartavyà V.+ bhartṛ V.+ bhrā́tṛ? V.+ bharítra RV. -bhárṇas RV. bhárman RV.C. bhárīman RV. bhā́rman RV. bhariṣá? RV. bhrūṇá V.+ bhārá V.+ bhārin B.+ bhāryà AV.+ -bhṛt V.+ bhṛtí V.+ bhṛ́ti ÇB1. bhṛ́tya (gdve.) B.+ bhṛ́tya (n.) AV. bhṛtyā́ V. bhṛtenya? AV. -bhṛtra RV. -bhṛ́tvan V. bhṛthá V.+ -babhra B. babhrí V. jarbhári RV. bámbhāri? B. bubhūrṣā S. bubhūrṣu C.
